title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix eggs and cheese, then combine with pasta.
Top with crispy bacon and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Grill the chicken until slightly charred.
Prepare the masala sauce using tomatoes, garlic, and spices.
Simmer the chicken in the sauce until fully cooked.
Finish with cream and garnish with coriander.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).
instructions: Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Prepare the creamy sauce with sour cream and garlic.
Simmer the beef in the sauce and serve over pasta or rice.
